content: sts optional waist shaping knit 3 rounds of stockinette or until your knitting is at the widest part of the bust when tried on begin waist decreases below if you are using a plant fibre yarn that has no elasticity make sure to try on your tee after every decrease round to ensure that you are still able to get the garment over your head and shoulders round 1 k1 ssk k to 3 sts before m k2tog k1 sm repeat one more time round 2 to 6 k to end repeat rounds 1 to 6 eight more times you should have 118 140 166 186 208 230 252 276 294 sts if you do not want waist shaping simply knit in stockinette for 60 rounds the body is finished with a simple lace hem next round p to end next round k to end next round k2tog yo repeat to end next round k and bind off every st including the yos wan cheng phua © copyright 2024 knittygrittysg com sleeves pick up and knit about 1 st per row along the underarm of the shirt you should have pick up and knit 20 28 32 36 40 40 44 44 44 sts see diagram below for reference start picking up sts here knit across held sleeve stitches and join in the round you should have 76 84 90 96 102 106 112 118 120 sts knit 10 14 16 18 20 20 22 22 22 sts until you reach the middle of the underarm this is where the bor will be so that it is hidden under the arm place bor marker knit in stockinette for 21 rounds the sleeves are finished with a simple lace hem next round p to end next round k to end next round k2tog yo repeat to end next round k and bind off every st including the yos wan cheng phua © copyright 2024 knittygrittysg com neck hem a b neck f c e d the neck hemline is finished with the same simple lace hem along a to b pick up and knit 1 st for every st along b to c pick up and knit 2 sts for every 3 row along c to d pick up and knit 1 st for every row along d to e pick up and knit 1 st for every st along e to f pick up and knit 1 st for every row along f to a pick up and knit 2 sts for every 3 row join in the round don t worry about picking up an exact number of stitches as long as it is an even number next round p to end next round k to end next round k2tog yo repeat to end next round k and bind off every st including the yos congratulations you are finished tag me on instagram @knittygritty_sg and use the hashtag #aiyutee to share your work i am excited to see all
